titles.title: Recognizing the 70th anniversary of the Idaho Potato Commission and expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that an Idaho Potato Month should be established.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 5/1/2007--Introduced. Recognizes the 70th anniversary of the Idaho Potato Commission. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that an Idaho Potato Month should be established.
